item.description:
Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton

Saturday, July 3 (meet at 9:30, launch at 9:45)

Beautiful, quiet reservoir, a few motorboats, lots of little islands to snake through... very suitable for beginners, we'll be on the water approx. 2 hours. As usual, PFDs and whistles are required.

For more information - http://www.mass.gov/d...

It's directly on Rt. 135 in Hopkinton. I'll leave it to everyone to check a map for their best way there.
item.name: Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton
